column5: My place is IN The Woodlands, not just the Spring area. Located 5 minutes from The Woodlands popular Market Street, Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion, MANY restaurants and movie theatres. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the close proximity to lots of shopping. Easy access to Hike and Bike Trails at the end of my street. George Bush International Airport is 21 miles away. Houston's cultural arts area is 30 miles away as well as major league sports venues for football, baseball and basketball.
